item.title: Coursework: parallel dense linear algebra
item.description: Dense linear algebra in parallel # You should submit your work for this coursework via DUO. The submission deadline is 2021/01/11 at 14:00UTC. Updates 2021/01/05 To avoid OpenBLAS parallelising with threads (and therefore destroying scaling behaviour), you need to do export OMP_NUM_THREADS=1 export OPENBLAS_NUM_THREADS=1 In your submission scripts (before running the benchmark). Apologies for not noticing this earlier. Updates 2021/01/04 Textual benchmark output advertised the wrong order of timing data.
